channel.title: Blog on Marek Dlugos — Revenue Growth, Product, Design, Software Engineering.
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Marek Dlugos — Revenue Growth, Product, Design, Software Engineering.

item.title: Motivation to Write
item.description: For many years I enjoyed reading blogs, but was never brave enough to write one myself. I found the fact that the content becomes obsolete and stuff I write won’t be true anymore (or people will disagree with me) scary. But here I am today, in the VS Code typing in the first lines of what I am hoping will help me clear my head and form my thoughts better. Become more intimate with the world and people who want to tag along.

item.title: 1 Backpack 150 Days on the Road From Freezing Cold to Sweating
item.description: It’s funny how when I tell people I travel for a longer period of time with one backpack only, people have a hard time to comprehend that while it seems incredibly easy to me. A couple of years ago, I kindly asked my friends to take two of my big suitcases from South Korea to Europe for me, while I embarked on a 2 month long adventure traveling through South East Asia on my own with a tiny Shopify backpack.

item.title: I Did 4 Semesters Abroad in Different Cities Here Is the Best City
How I Quit My Job and Traveled for Four Months
